posts.title: On Fantasy Names
posts.excerpt: One of the joys of writing secondary world fantasy is naming everything: characters, places, and the occasional bit of fictional language for flavor. (Maybe, in our case, a lot of the latte, especially in our early drafts!) But it's also one of the intimidating part: how do you make names that feel authentic without spending years creating a whole language?

posts.title: Our Writing Process
posts.excerpt: We are not a kitchen tap. It's obvious, I know: we're people in a human suit. But when it comes to writing, we cannot sit down and simply turn on the tap and water/words flow out of us. We are an old-fashioned water pump, and we have to be primed first.
